name: Fishing Road
description:
Fishing Road

There has been an outbreak. Thousands of companies have closed down and more than 3 million workers have been laid off, including you. You're a man with a son and a spouse to feed. 

With the fishing knowledge your father taught you, you must change your lifestyle from a career man into a hardworking angler and choose the right choices to keep your family alive in this difficult time. Would you choose money above all else for the sake of your family? Or would you choose morals to maintain your integrity? The choice is all yours.

What to expect:
1. Unique fishes and items to collect!
2. In-game days with different events each day!
3. Beautiful pixel art!
4. A chill and relaxing game to kill your time!
5. Interesting story!
6. Beautiful places to fish in!

What to do:
- Manage your finances!
- Feed your family!
- Choose life-changing choices!
- Collect all the fishes and items!
- Unlock all the maps!

By SmolBrain Muhammad Iqbal Kalevi - Game Programmer Muhammad Hafiizul Kirom - Game Artist
